page.title: 15Mount Pleasant farm survey
page.content: Mount Pleasant farm is an upland farm in the N.E. corner of the D Block.The farm is 42 acres which is about average for this part of Wales. The day for Mr.+ Mrs. Thomas usually starts at 6.30am when breakfast is served to the 3 children, and then the animals are seen to. They have a variety of farm animals the main stay of the farm being sheep. There are just over 200 sheep <Welsh Mountain> including 4 rams. The sheep population increases to over 300 in February _ April <The lambing season>. There are 10 beef cattle on the farm with no dairy cattle. The breeds are Hereford, Fresian, Welsh Black and Charalois. The young boy David aged 9 years has a Welsh Black Pony as a pet. They have 4 dogs and 4 cats, the dogs are working sheep dogs.
